## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G13220](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G13220)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ABCG26, AtABCG26, MSR02, WBC27</u>
- **Gene Name:** ATP-binding cassette G26
- **Description:**   ABC-2 type transporter family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_062317]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Male sterile.Abnormal pollen wall development.
   - [SALK_062317C]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Mutant plants had very small siliques, showing very low fertility. The the anther locules turned brown upon maturity and released fewer pollen grains than wildtype plants.
